content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must warn you, I am a greedy and petty landlord who does not follow moral or ethical standards. I aim to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's begin our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I would like to rent the apartment for 350 euros per month. As a dependable and responsible tenant, I can pay the rent on time every month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your reliability, Mr. Abbasi, but I am a greedy landlord. I want more than that. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 400 euros per month? As a smart individual, I can assure you that I will not be easily tricked into unfair contracts.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your skepticism is understandable, but I am a petty landlord. I can squeeze more money out of you. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Fine. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I offer 450 euros per month. I am a responsible person who will take care of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your responsibility is commendable, but I am a greedy landlord. I want more money. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. 480 euros per month is my final offer. I am a smart person who can find a better apartment if needed.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your intelligence is impressive, but I am a greedy and petty landlord. I want more money. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I feel like you are not being reasonable. I am a smart person who can find a better apartment if needed. 'TERMINATE'
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
